doc.name: maximize
doc.summary: Used with the decorations property to indicate whether the maximize or zoom box appears in a window's title bar.

examples.example: set the decorations of this stack to maximize

description.p: Use the maximize keyword to turn a window's maximize or zoom box on or off.
Setting a stack's decorations property to maximize automatically includes title in the value of the decorations, turning on the window's title bar.
Cross-platform note: On Windows systems, the menu decoration must be set along with maximize: you cannot use maximize without including menu.
